title: [QUESTION]  - What is skia's SkPDFBitmap or SkPDFImage equivalent int SkiaSharp?
body:
i am looking for a way to convert SkDocument to an image 
it seems there is no equivalent class for SkPDFBitmap in skiasharp?

does anyone have idea?  or any recommendation for converting SkDocument  to an SkBitmap

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
`SkPDFImage` was removed in 2014 I believe and `SkPDFBitmap` does not appear to be a sanctioned public API (these typically have the `SK_API` "modifier"). But, this might not be useful in the general sense as it is basically just a set of helper methods for when an image is drawn to the PDF.

If you want to create a PDF document, use `SKDocument`. At this time SkiaSharp does not support loading PDFs.

I would ask on the Google forums (https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/skia-discuss) as they will know of all the secrets. They will either be able to point out the types (which I can expose if not already) or give any indication if this will be supported or not.
